root.name: Can You See What I See?: Curfuffles Collectibles
root.description: In Can You See What I See??, we meet poor Clyde Curfuffle, proprietor of Curfuffle`s Collectibles. He`s suffered a fire, a flood, and a nasty fall that`s put him in the hospital. The string of bad luck events just won`t stop, and he needs your help to save his collectibles shop! One of his favorite collectibles may sell for a lot of money, but you have to find out which one! Seymour will help you fill orders, find rare items and solve the secret code to unravel the mystery.
